Moogys art share time

this time im bringing around my final project in my surreal unit for art class (i will miss you surreal unit ;__;) its a surreal self portrait but we had to spin a wheel and get two things we needed to incorporate mine were Kanye West and examination. if you can figure out how Kanye West fits into this then ill give you a shit ton of cookies

spoilering due to mild gore
